name: LayerZero
text: LayerZero is an Omnichain communication protocol designed to simplify message passing across chains.

name: StarkNet
text: Starknet is a decentralized Validity-Rollup (often referred to as ZK-Rollup). It operates as a Layer 2 network over Ethereum.

text: Polygon zkEVM Beta is the leading ZK scaling solution that is equivalent to Ethereum Virtual Machine.
